text: hey angel today I'm going to show you
how to make restaurant style Thai iced
tea at home so if you're like me and you
like bubble tea and you like milk tea
every once in a while you'll probably
have a craving for Thai iced tea but
times tea can get expensive as you know
going Tao bubble tea every day can be
expensive as well so I have a good
alternative for you guys I actually got
this a couple weeks ago it's Thai iced
tea tea bags and almost a link in the
video description below but this box
comes with 20 individual single serving
tea bags so it's really convenient if
you've made Thai iced tea before at home
you've probably used loose leaf tea
leaves where you need to cook and boil
over so well this is so much easier and
honestly I cannot taste the difference
between this and what I tried the
restaurant so with that let's get
started I'll show you guys how to brew
this tea and mix it up so that you can
get an authentic cup of Thai iced tea at
home first start with 1 cup of hot
boiling water add 1 Thai iced tea tea
bag now if you like yours extra strong
you can always opt for two tea bags
instead but I think it tastes good with
just one let that sit and brew for a
full 5 minutes to ensure we get a nice
bold flavor then remove the tea bag and
add your sweetener I recommend using one
and a half tablespoons of organic cane
sugar mix well and set that aside while
you fill serving glass with ice
about 70% full pour the hot tea mixture
over the ice then add
and 1/2 tablespoons of half-and-half now
this is literally the best part of
making this drink I love the way the
mixture looks when pouring finally stir
with a straw before drinking and serving
so this is how you can make authentic
Thai iced tea at home using a tea bag as
you can see it was super quick and easy
very convenient with the tea bag and it
satisfies your Thai iced tea craving I
hope you guys try this recipe if you
like you can also add boba as well and
I'll post some recipe links in the video
description below but now it's time for
the taste test Cheers
it's really good I'll see you guys next
time
bye
we just need an authentic taste so I
highly recommend them
it's me and it's made from a blender
that is the woodpecker I can't believe
that seriously go away Woody Woodpecker
okay where was I
